column1: Help messages during the {log-on procedure} must not aid an unauthorized user, e.g., by indicating which {parts of the data} are correct or incorrect

A security incident must be raised if a potential attempted or successful breach of {log-on controls} is detected, and, when the risk of the incident warrants it, the account shall be temporarily restricted, plus an alert shall be sent to the {account owner}, and to the {organization's system administrators}.
Physical or logical access controls must be implemented to isolate {sensitive applications, data, or systems}.
{Access to data} must be controlled based on {user identity, group membership, and assigned roles}
column3: Access Control for Vehicle & Material Data
Dock Manager Role for Dock Data
Dock Manager Role for Warehouse Inventory
Role-Based Access Control for External Entities
Logistics Terminal Car Registry Access Control
Production Plan Data Store Access Control

column1: The {organization} shall maintain a record of {all privileges allocated}

column3: Record of Privileges for Factory System Admins
Car Manufacturer Access Control Record [external entities]
Audit Trail for Access and Privilege Changes

column1: The {organization} shall regularly review {users} with privileged access rights to ensure that their {duties}, {roles}, {responsibilities}, and {competence} still justify such access

column3: Regular Review of Privileged Access for Logistics Terminal Employees

column1: {Connection} of {systems} to the {network} must be restricted and filtered, e.g., using firewalls.

column3: Filtered Network Access for IoT Middleware Platforms
Secure Network Access for AGVs and Robots

column1: {Network administration channels} must be segregated from {other network traffic}

column3: Isolation of Network Administration from Logistics Network Traffic

column1: Implement cryptographic measures to safeguard {information stored} on {mobile user} {endpoint devices} or {storage media} and transmitted over {networks}

column3: Secure Transmission and Storage of Production Plans

column1: Establish a comprehensive key management system, including procedures for generating and protecting {cryptographic keys} and recovering {encrypted data} in case of lost, compromised, or damaged {keys}

column3: Secure Key Management for Automated Systems
